svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: A higher Gini index represents higher inequality.
Source: Povcal (2018), The Chartbook of Economic Inequality (2017), Kandbur et al. (2017) Table 1.B
Note: Estimates are based on household survey data of either incomes or consumption. All countries for which comparable surveys within five
years of each reference year were available are shown.
